subject: Swimming
Drug Abuse and Traffic
Marijuana
lead_paragraph: The Olympic champion Michael Phelps said he hoped to learn from the fallout of a photograph that showed him smoking from a marijuana pipe. Phelps, outside the pool where he trains in Baltimore, made his first public comments since the photo surfaced in a British tabloid over the weekend.
snippet: The Olympic champion Michael Phelps said he hoped to learn from the fallout of a photograph that showed him smoking from a marijuana pipe. Phelps, outside the pool where he trains in Baltimore, made his first public comments since the photo surfaced...
